org.eng.storage

Class AbstractReadOnlyStorage<ITEM>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.eng.storage.AbstractReadOnlyStorage<ITEM>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IReadOnlyStorage<ITEM>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractDeleteableItemStorage, FileSoundStorage

    public abstract class AbstractReadOnlyStorage<ITEM>
extends Object
implements IReadOnlyStorage<ITEM>

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      AbstractReadOnlyStorage() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      long count()
      A non-optimal implementation that counts all the ids returned by IReadOnlyStorage.getIDs().
      Iterable<ITEM> findItems(Iterable<String> ids)
      Non-optimal implementation that uses StoredItemByIDIterable with the given ids.
      protected static List<String> getPagedIDs(int pageIndex, int pageSize, Iterable<String> ids)
      A helper method to allow subclasses to cheat when implementing paged ids.
      Iterable<ITEM> items()
      Uses the ids from #getIDs() to create an iterable that dereferences the ids.

    • Method Detail

      • count

        public long count()
           throws StorageException
        A non-optimal implementation that counts all the ids returned by IReadOnlyStorage.getIDs().
        Specified by:
        count in interface IReadOnlyStorage<ITEM>
        Returns:
        0 or larger.
        Throws:
        StorageException

      • items

        public Iterable<ITEM> items()
                     throws StorageException
        Uses the ids from #getIDs() to create an iterable that dereferences the ids.
        Specified by:
        items in interface IReadOnlyStorage<ITEM>
        Returns:
        never null.
        Throws:
        StorageException

      • findItems

        public Iterable<ITEM> findItems(Iterable<String> ids)
                         throws StorageException
        Non-optimal implementation that uses StoredItemByIDIterable with the given ids.
        Specified by:
        findItems in interface IReadOnlyStorage<ITEM>
        Returns:
        a iterable of items containing the same number of items as the input id list.
        Throws:
        StorageException - if not all items could be retrieved. Note that an exception such as NoSuchElementException may be thrown while iterating the return iterable if items could not be retrieved.

      • getPagedIDs

        protected static List<String> getPagedIDs(int pageIndex,
                                          int pageSize,
                                          Iterable<String> ids)
                                   throws StorageException
        A helper method to allow subclasses to cheat when implementing paged ids.
        Parameters:
        pageIndex -
        pageSize -
        ids -
        Returns:
        never null.
        Throws:
        StorageException
